mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(evaluate_score)) FROM tbl_order_item_evaluate WHERE machine_id=#{machineId} AND evaluate_memo IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(evaluate_memo)!='';

SELECT DISTINCT CAST(toie.goods_id AS CHAR) AS goodsId, toie.goods_name AS goodsName,CAST(toie.evaluate_score AS CHAR) AS grade, tc.customer_name AS nickName,toie.evaluate_memo AS commentContent, DATE_FORMAT(toie.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS commentDate FROM tbl_order_item_evaluate toie LEFT JOIN tbl_order tod ON toie.order_id=tod.order_id LEFT JOIN tbl_customer tc ON tod.customer_id=tc.customer_id WHERE toie.machine_id=#{machineId} AND toie.evaluate_memo IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(toie.evaluate_memo)!='' ORDER BY toie.evaluate_time DESC;

SELECT tid.cell_id AS cellId,bmc.cell_num AS cellNum, if(tid.item_status>0,1,0) as itemStatus, bmc.row_num as cellRow, bmc.col_num as cellColumn FROM tbl_item_detail tid LEFT JOIN basics_machine_cell bmc ON tid.item_id=bmc.item_id WHERE tid.machine_id=#{machineId} AND tid.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND bmc.cell_status='1' ORDER BY bmc.cell_num ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_item_detail tid LEFT JOIN basics_machine_cell bmc ON tid.item_id=bmc.item_id WHERE tid.machine_id=#{machineId} AND tid.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND bmc.cell_status='1'

SELECT CAST(toie.goods_id AS CHAR) AS goodsId ,toie.goods_name AS goodsName, CAST(toie.evaluate_score AS CHAR) AS grade, tc.customer_name AS nickName,toie.evaluate_memo AS commentContent, DATE_FORMAT(toie.evaluate_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS commentDate FROM tbl_order_item_evaluate toie LEFT JOIN tbl_order_detail tid ON toie.order_detail_id=tid.order_detail_id LEFT JOIN tbl_order tod ON toie.order_id=tod.order_id LEFT JOIN tbl_customer tc ON tod.customer_id=tc.customer_id WHERE toie.machine_id=#{machineId} AND toie.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND toie.evaluate_memo IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(toie.evaluate_memo)!='' ORDER BY toie.evaluate_time DESC;

SELECT bum.machine_id AS machineId, bm.machine_name AS machineName, bm.address FROM basics_user_machine bum, basics_machine bm WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND special_role_num=#{specialRoleNum} AND bum.machine_id=bm.machine_id

SELECT m.machine_id AS machineId, m.machine_name AS machineName, m.address FROM basics_machine m, ( SELECT company_id FROM basics_users WHERE user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) u WHERE m.company_id=u.company_id AND machine_status=1 AND isdel='N'

SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, CAST(COUNT(dc.goods_id) AS CHAR) AS goodsNum FROM basics_goods g, ( SELECT d.goods_id FROM tbl_item_detail d, ( SELECT item_id FROM basics_machine_cell WHERE machine_id=#{machineId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND cell_status=1 ) c WHERE d.item_id=c.item_id AND item_status=0 ) dc WHERE g.goods_id=dc.goods_id GROUP BY dc.goods_id

SELECT gdc.goodsName, gdc.goodsNum FROM ( SELECT u.user_name AS companyName FROM basics_users u WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} ) cu, ( SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, CAST(COUNT(dc.goods_id) AS CHAR) AS goodsNum, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(g.goods_name,'(',-1),')',1) AS companyName FROM basics_goods g, ( SELECT d.goods_id FROM tbl_item_detail d, ( SELECT item_id FROM basics_machine_cell WHERE machine_id=#{machineId} AND cell_status=1 ) c WHERE d.item_id=c.item_id AND item_status=0 ) dc WHERE g.goods_id=dc.goods_id GROUP BY dc.goods_id ) gdc WHERE cu.companyName=gdc.companyName
